## Overview

Select a passage of text. Tokens differing across the Latin documents are highlighted; the corresponding passages of the Targum Onkelos and the Septuagint are included for comparison with the glosses.

- [HTML version](./glossing-vocabulary.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/compare-texts/glossing-vocabulary.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
